title: Deep tech start-up CynLr raises $4.5 mn for making intelligent robots - Business Today
content: Deep tech start-up CynLr raises $4.5 mn for making intelligent robots  Business Today
description: Pre-series A round was led by Speciale Invest and growX Ventures; Anicut Capital, Infoedge, Java Capital, Venture Catalysts and Arali Ventures also participated in the round.
